headlines.headline: Stephen A.: Disgraceful of Lakers to not play stars vs. Spurs
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith voices his criticism of the Lakers for not playing their stars vs. the Spurs.

headlines.headline: Windhorst: Jazz tanking more 'egregious,' but still within the rules
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst chimes in on accusations that the Utah Jazz have been "tanking" late in games and says they're not the only franchise doing it

headlines.headline: 'The Hoop Collective': Episodes of Brian Windhorst's NBA podcast
headlines.description: From breaking news to the latest intel from around the NBA, here are the biggest highlights from Brian Windhorst's "The Hoop Collective" podcast.

headlines.headline: Fantasy basketball fast break: Pair of Kings worth stashing before break
headlines.description: A look around the league reveals the slumping Kings potentially turning to their youth, Gui Santos is coming up big for the Warriors and more.

headlines.headline: Inside the ugly split between Jonathan Kuminga and the Warriors
headlines.description: The Warriors' divorce from Jonathan Kuminga finally came on Feb. 4 when he was traded to the Hawks.

headlines.headline: NBA playoff race questions: Are the Cavs the East favorites?
headlines.description: So long, trade deadline. It's time for the push to the NBA Finals. Here's how we see the top of the Eastern Conference and what we're watching.

headlines.headline: ESPN's 'Year of the Super Bowl' to be year-round experience
headlines.description: ESPN is planning on making the Super Bowl a year-around experience instead of just one day. At the forefront of the promotion is "Year of the Super Bowl," which will see extensive promotion and programming across ESPN, ABC and Disney stations.

headlines.headline: WNBA player offers to testify vs. Falcons' Pearce in domestic case
headlines.description: An attorney for WNBA player Rickea Jackson said she is "willing to testify" against Falcons player James Pearce Jr. if the domestic violence charges against him go to trial.

headlines.headline: Greeny: It's a win-win for Raiders to trade Maxx Crosby
headlines.description: Mike Greenberg and the "Get Up" crew weigh in on whether it's time for the Raiders to trade Maxx Crosby.

headlines.headline: How good will the Giants be next season?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew evaluates the current state of the Giants and debates what they are capable of achieving next season.

headlines.headline: Will Lamar and Jesse Minter lead Ravens to a Super Bowl?
headlines.description: Jeff Saturday and Jason McCourty weigh in on what the Ravens need to do to be in the Super Bowl conversation next season.

headlines.headline: Sources: Giants hire Brian Callahan to John Harbaugh's staff
headlines.description: The Giants are hiring former Titans head coach Brian Callahan as their quarterbacks coach and passing game coordinator, sources told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Olympic 2026 men's hockey preview: Players, teams, favorites
headlines.description: The NHL is back at the Olympics! Here are the top players to know, each team's medal chances and schedule, and much more.

headlines.headline: Olympic hockey betting odds: Canada, USA favored as men's tournament begins Wednesday
headlines.description: Who are the favorites and underdogs in the men's and women's 2026 Olympic ice hockey tournaments?

headlines.headline: Auston Matthews named captain of the U.S. men's hockey team at Olympics
headlines.description: Auston Matthews named captain of the U.S. men's hockey team at Olympics

headlines.headline: Who has won a Stanley Cup, Olympic gold in the same year?
headlines.description: Winning Olympic gold and the Stanley Cup in one year remains one of hockey's rarest feats. Check out who has achieved the honor now.

headlines.headline: Canada, U.S. top Olympic men's hockey gold medal betting odds
headlines.description: With the return of NHL players to the Olympics, Canada is favored to win the gold medal at +115 odds followed by the U.S. at +175, per DraftKings.

headlines.headline: Which NHL players have the most goals at the Olympics?
headlines.description: As Olympic men's hockey looks ahead to 2026, past performances still shape the sport's legacy.
